Evangelist's Responsibility to the Interested.--It is important that all who design to labor in the cause of God should learn the very best manner of prosecuting 
                                                                           157
their work. . . . I have been shown that many efforts which have been made at great expense to present the truth, have been in a large measure unsuccessful, because the very kind of labor that is required has not been done. We have tried for years to present before our people the necessity of working more intelligently. . . .
